dict.acceptation: 领导；领导的才能或能力；一群领导者；带路，指引；

sent.orig: Rotary International has adopted a Club Leadership Plan that calls for leadership training for club members.
sent.trans: 国际扶轮已经正式通过了一项扶轮社领导计划用来倡导训练扶轮社社员的之领导力。

sent.orig: To uphold the Party's leadership calls for improving its leadership.
sent.trans: 要坚持党的领导，必须改善党的领导。

sent.orig: Leadership corruption and leadership cheat are originated from loopholes and imperfection of the system.
sent.trans: 官员腐败和作弊产生于制度的漏洞或不完善。

sent.orig: And most researchers suggested that transformational leadership was more effective than transactional leadership.
sent.trans: 一般认为，变革型领导是比交易型领导更为有效的领导方式。

sent.orig: Four generic business-level strategies: cost leadership, differentiation, focused cost leadership, and focused differentiation.
sent.trans: 经营层面的四个战略：成本导向，细分化，集中成本导向，及集中细分化。
